Title: Mona Lisa's Revenge (2)
Plot: As Luke and Rani investigate the myth of the dreaded abomination, Mona Lisa vows to free her horrifying brother from his prison, but everything now depends upon Clyde to stop the terror.
GuestStars: Suranne Jones, Jeff Rawle, Lizo Mzimba, Liza Sadovy, Paul Kasey, Ace Bhatti
